title: Riot, if that leaked Kai'sa skin is accurate, you definitely need to keep working on it and fix it
body: It's not looking that good right now and a lot of people are very underwhelmed with the goofy pink hair and black leather pants on the various boards upon seeing it. There is still time though! You may have made yourself a lot more money by knowing it will be received poorly and now having the chance to fix it up. Free early criticism.

replies.body: The outfit is cool, the only criticism im seeing on it is "waaaaaah cover her up more! you're sexualizing her!!!" but like.. sure that makes sense for her default skin because it is an issue, but people are forgetting skins are an alternate universe. Jesus christ let the girl be sexy.
I think it's the goofy hair moreso than the skimpy clothes but I can't speak for the masses.
the hair is absolutely awful, i agree with that.

I've literally not seen ANYONE say that about it at all lmao.

Kaisa is LITERALLY in a skin tight body suit with her rack out in her CLASSIC skin of all things. The only criticisms semi-close to that refer to her as a whole, so obviously it's going to be the same for a post release skin. 

God forbid people have opinions that don't line up with your own lmao.

You obviously don't read reddit comments. Most of them were talking about how kai'sas skin is even more revealing than the base and how that's a problem.

God forbid you actually look into things before opening your dumb yap lmfao.

Nah I just don't pay attention to the 1% who say stuff like that. 

The majority don't make comments like that, and you'll only find them if you intentionally go looking.

People like you go looking to get triggered and it's rather pathetic.
Like, what theme even is this skin?! Why did Riot decide to not give her any kind of suit? Literally an integral part of her.
K-Pop skins. Evelynn, Akali, Kai'Sa and maybe a new Ahri skin. There were some really low resolution pictures of their splash art/promotional art on twitter.

> [{quoted}](name=Leetri,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cyQTPJOI,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2018-09-25T15:11:36.689+0000)
>
> K-Pop skins. Evelynn, Akali, Kai'Sa and maybe a new Ahri skin. There were some really low resolution pictures of their splash art/promotional art on twitter.

Seen the reveal. Makes sense now.
According to the new leak, the theme is Pop Star.

Her hair and outfit is based on typical Korean fashion.

They wont change it.

We aren't even the skin's target audience.
Yup, especially since we now know they are called popstar! Which brings the question of " what is the fate of the current popstar ahri" as we see her in this set too
If we play the game, we are the skins target audience, and while it may be accurate to Korean fashion it still looks ugly in game.

No, Bronies arent the target audience just because they watch MLP.

The target audience of the skins is the Korean playerbase.

Also youve yet to see the skin in game.
I don't think they're making money on this one - it appears to be the Victorious skin. That said, I like the general look. I like her more urban appearance.
have you ever seen a victorious skin? it looks absolutely nothing like that

I've seen them, but there were also a lot of rumors that they were going to be shaking up how they did Victorious designs in the years to come.

However, if the new leaks are true, this is a Pop Star skin though.
Besides that it being Popstar was confirmed, we already knew this years victorious was Khazix.
Kha'Zix is the Championship skin, not the Victorious skin.
Victorious Vladimir or Swain dont @ me
I mean, you cant make any real criticism off a static picture when the product is an in game model. Thats not even the natural viewing angle of the skin

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cyQTPJOI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-24T19:20:51.307+0000)
>
> I mean, you cant make any real criticism off a static picture when the product is an in game model. Thats not even the natural viewing angle of the skin

You can say or notice some things if they are not all right even from just a picture. The color palette is so random I have to say that..pink black some goldish...
We dont know what the skin is supposed to be yet, or how it will look in game/abilities look like, so cant really call the palette random.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cyQTPJOI,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-09-25T01:19:58.385+0000)
>
> We dont know what the skin is supposed to be yet, or how it will look in game/abilities look like, so cant really call the palette random.

You can say stuff about an image with colors as long you have eyes...
I believe I just did.
How, pray tell, can you criticize something youve never seen?
That hair is just gods awful. The style, the color. Just... Ugh...
KPop.

https://twitter.com/woosimhun3849/status/1044508873879543808

Some really low resolution splash arts got leaked as well.

Looks like it's some kind of rap K-pop dance group with Kai'sa, Evelynn, Akali and Ahri.

I'm not really a fan, looks like a kind of shit theme.

Might be a cheaper line. 975 or even 750. We got a couple of 975 for the World cup, Galio's April Fools was 975 but it was 1350 quality and Eve's Bloodmoon was 975 and that's it this year.

Although would be a bit harsh to release 2 skins for Evelynn in the same year but both be 975 or under.

(of course, getting 2 skins in a year is a plus for mains, Taliyah mains don't even know what skins are. :P)
I have my doubts. They're all pretty high income champions for Riot. It'll probs be a very expensive skin line.
We don't even know the theme name of the skin, haven't seen the abilities, ect.  So it's sad how people are really quick to judge on a single still image.
How is the theme name going to change how the skin is received? lol
It tells you what the idea behind it is?

The title gives you the intention but it will not change how the skin is received externally.

If Dragon Sorc Zyra was called "Program Zyra" I can tell you people aren't going to think it's not a dragon themed skin.
Thats a terrible comparison, theres like no thought behind that at all.

I'm like 90% sure it's a Slayer skin. You know, that skin line from two Halloweens ago with Jinx and Pantheon.

She has a rather punk look to her, and being shown alongside Bewitching Janna I can only assume it's a Harrowing skin.

They usually only go with one theme a year for harrowing so i dunno about that. It was also shown alongside the championship kha'zix skin, i think it might be unrelated and is part of another event since it also said "3 events"
I originally thought it was Irelia.
Same.  I've got a feeling we are going to get this a lot moving forward.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cyQTPJOI,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-09-25T13:28:28.636+0000)
>
> I originally thought it was Irelia.

i wish XD
I like the new Kai'sa skin and the hair was my favorite part of it... she reminds me of Jolyne Kujo from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. Hopefully she comes with chromas.

The splashart and idea is fine but the ingame model is fucking horrible, Riot started doing proper faces ingame recently but this skin goes back to Battlebunny Riven's quality (the ingame model is *****)
ay, we can change the goofy pink hair, but i think the black leather pants need to stay... and be tighter.

Because they sure fixed that A Sol skin right

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Jesus it's like they want her to be anime-themed.
The hair really doesn't match the rest of the skin, agreed.
I totally agree, this is the single worst looking skin I've seen in recent memory, and I know Sewn Chaos skins were pulled from PBE so I hope this goes the same way.
